snippet: As the V.A. expands benefits to cover job training, it needs to ensure that for-profit schools are not just cashing in, but actually educating veterans.
lead_paragraph: As the V.A. expands benefits to cover job training, it needs to ensure that for-profit schools are not just cashing in, but actually educating veterans.

headline.print_headline: A Broader G.I. Bill: As the V.A. expands benefits to cover job training, it needs to ensure veterans really benefit
